title: Part 592 - Procedure for the modification or extinguishment of a conservation easement held by the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation
content:
Part 592 - Procedure for the modification or extinguishment of a conservation easement held by the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation

§ 592.2 - Definitions
§ 592.3 - Standards
§ 592.4 - Procedures

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
